com.twiddles.ganesha
Class Ganesha

java.lang.Object
  com.twiddles.ganesha.Ganesha
public class Ganesha
extends java.lang.Object

This class is intended to be run by users in order to start up the Ganesha application.

Constructor Detail

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Performs the initialisation of the Ganesha application. This method checks that the Java version is > 1.4 and warns the user if that is not the case. Then it attempts to lauch the Ganesha GUI by constructing a GUI object and calling it's show() method. If this fails (for example on a headless machine) a user friendly error message is displayed before exiting.

Parameters:
args - if the first argument is a filename that file will be opened
See Also:
GUI
